TopicTitle: I think the Kerbal's instruments are a bit off

Articles.Content:
(relatively) Simple fix.

Just take whatever variables you have for the Re-entry heat appearing, and apply them to the Goo, so as they aren't cold during re-entry.

I think it would be cool if reentry were considered a seperate situation for science tests - it makes sense that scientists would want crew reports and instrument readings from ships in reentry, and I feel any excuse for more sciency flavour text is a good idea
Temperature parameters are a placeholder for now, that will be revised in the future once it becomes relevant. There is no science event for reentry anyway.
LOL, also, when on the Mun and you read tempatures, at day it's negative tempature and at night its positive.
